info.title: SmartDev LMS API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for SmartDev Academic Learning Management System. This API provides endpoints for managing courses, students, instructors, assignments, submissions, grades, attendance, and more.

get.description: Retrieve announcements with filtering options (students see only published announcements for enrolled courses)

post.description: Create a new announcement (global or course-specific)

get.description: Retrieve a specific announcement and increment view count

post.description: Change announcement status to published
Change announcement status to archived

get.description: Retrieve all announcements for a specific course (including global announcements)
Retrieve all published global announcements
Retrieve all active (non-expired) announcements for the user
Retrieve assignments based on user role. Admin sees all, instructor sees their courses, student sees enrolled courses

post.description: Create a new assignment for a course (Instructor/Admin only)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific assignment

post.description: Allow students to check in for an open attendance session

403.description: Not a student or not enrolled

post.description: Student requests sick leave for an attendance session

403.description: Not a student or not enrolled

post.description: Student requests permission to be absent for an attendance session

403.description: Not a student or not enrolled

post.description: Mark attendance for multiple students at once (Instructor/Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve all attendance records for a specific session
Retrieve attendance sessions with filtering (students see only sessions for enrolled courses)

post.description: Create a new attendance session for a course

get.description: Retrieve a specific attendance session with attendance records and summary

post.description: Change attendance session status to open
Change attendance session status to closed
Automatically mark students as absent if they haven't checked in after deadline

get.description: Retrieve attendance summary statistics for a specific session
Retrieve all attendance sessions for a specific course
Retrieve all active (open) attendance sessions for a specific course

post.description: This endpoint is deprecated. Use role-specific registration endpoints instead.
Authenticate user and return access token. Supports all roles: student, instructor, parent, admin, calon_siswa
Invalidate the current user's token

get.description: Retrieve a list of certificates with optional filtering
Get detailed information about a specific certificate

post.description: Generate a certificate for a specific enrollment

400.description: Certificate already exists or not eligible

post.description: Generate certificates for all eligible students in a course

404.description: Course not found or no enrollments

get.description: Public endpoint to verify certificate validity by code
Public endpoint to verify certificate validity by ID

post.description: Revoke an issued certificate

get.description: Get all certificates for a specific student
Get all certificates issued for a specific course
Check if a student enrollment is eligible for a certificate
Retrieve a list of all courses with instructor information

post.description: Create a new course (Admin/Instructor only)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific course including modules, materials, and assignments
Retrieve course modules based on user role (students see only modules from enrolled courses)

post.description: Create a new module for a course

get.description: Retrieve a specific course module with its materials
Retrieve a list of all enrollments with student and course details

post.summary: Enroll a student in a course
post.description: Create a new enrollment for a student in a specific course

get.description: Retrieve a specific enrollment with student and course details

put.description: Enrollments are generally not updated, only created or deleted

message.example: Enrollment updates are not typically supported.

delete.description: Remove a student's enrollment from a course

get.summary: Get grade components for a course
get.description: Retrieve all grade components for a specific course with weight validation

post.description: Create a new grade component for a course with weight validation

get.description: Retrieve a specific grade component with its grades

put.description: Update an existing grade component with weight validation

delete.description: Remove a grade component (only if no grades exist)

400.description: Cannot delete component with existing grades

post.description: Create a new grade entry for a student in a specific grade component
Create multiple grade entries at once for multiple students

get.description: Retrieve all grades for a student in a specific course including final grade
Retrieve grades summary and statistics for a specific course
Retrieve a list of all instructors with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, specialization, or instructor code

post.description: Create a new instructor record and associated user account

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific instructor

delete.description: Delete an instructor record and associated user account

get.description: Get all courses taught by an instructor
Get all active courses taught by an instructor
Retrieve materials based on user role (students see only materials from enrolled courses)
Retrieve all notifications for authenticated user with filtering options
Retrieve a specific notification and automatically mark as read

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read
Mark a specific notification as unread
Mark all unread notifications for authenticated user as read

get.description: Retrieve all unread notifications for authenticated user
Get the count of unread notifications for authenticated user

post.description: Mark multiple notifications as read at once
Delete multiple notifications at once

get.description: Retrieve a list of all parents with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or phone

post.description: Create a new parent record and associated user account

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific parent

delete.description: Delete a parent record and associated user account

get.description: Get all students associated with a parent
Get all active students associated with a parent

post.description: Change the authenticated user's password
Send password reset link to email

message.example: Link reset password telah dikirim ke email Anda.

post.description: Reset password using token
Register a new prospective student
Upload documents (ijazah, skhun, kk, akta) for registration

get.description: Get current registration status of the authenticated user
Get list of all registrations (Admin only)
Get details of a specific registration (Admin only)

post.description: Approve a registration and create student account (Admin only)
Reject a registration (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all students with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or student number

post.description: Create a new student record and associated user account

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific student

delete.description: Delete a student record and associated user account

get.description: Get all courses a student is enrolled in
Get all assignment submissions for a student
Retrieve a list of all assignment submissions

post.description: Create a new assignment submission (student must be enrolled in course)

403.description: Not enrolled in course or not a student

get.description: Retrieve a specific submission with assignment and student details
Get a list of users with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new user (Admin only)

get.description: Get details of a specific user

bearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
